description:
Personal Health Record Application
Harp is a privacy centric on-device Personal Health Record application allowing
you to create and manage records in plain Org Mode files that are completely
under your control.

Harp is currently under development. You can add journal entries but other
features will come in later releases. The core structure of the Org Mode file is
nearly set (documentation pending) and you can, of course, work on those files
from Emacs on your desktop without relying on Harp.
